content: I think I'll definitely incorporate plyometric exercises into my training routine to improve my explosiveness on the court. I'll start with lower intensities and focus on proper technique to avoid injury. I'll also combine plyometrics with strength training exercises that target my legs, glutes, and core to maximize power development. Thanks for the tips! By the way, I have a yoga class every Wednesday evening at 7 pm, and I think it's been helping me with my flexibility and balance, which could also benefit my serve.
